name: Horror in Space
description:
In Horror in Space, you play as Michael, an astronaut, finally receiving the message he was waiting for. He will go home. But before that, he is looking for all the things he collected on his journey, so he goes through every memory again. And it gets scary.

Memory 1: Now available:

Mike begins his journey, as things go wrong... The guesttaker is alwayS watching...

The game:

Horror in Space is an athmospheric and gameplay based game, which might look a bit small, but which has grand plans behind it for the next memories. Horror in Space uses an unique gravity first person system, floating AI's, Voice Acting and much more.

Notes

This game has controller support. It's recommended to use only one screen, as we didn't lock the mouse yet. The game is going to come out episodically.
